title: Define Project Scope and Requirements - Revised
description: This task involves gathering, documenting, and refining the project requirements, constraints, and success criteria for the CarbonCaptureOptimizer system. The scope includes understanding the current carbon capture processes, identifying key areas for optimization (e.g., energy consumption, material usage, waste reduction), defining system goals (e.g., maximizing efficiency, minimizing environmental impact, reducing costs, promoting sustainability), and establishing measurable success metrics such as carbon emissions reduction targets, cost savings, and operational efficiency improvements. Upon completion, a comprehensive requirements document will be produced for the project team.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall architecture of the CarbonCaptureOptimizer system, including the AI model, data pipeline, user interface, and infrastructure. Consider scalability, maintainability, modularity, and performance optimizations. Define the roles and responsibilities of each component, as well as their interactions. Ensure proper error handling, logging mechanisms, and monitoring are in place. Address security considerations, such as data encryption, access controls, and secure communication channels. Incorporate best practices for AI system development, including explainability, fairness, and robustness. Additionally, consider the integration of real-time data processing and edge computing for efficient carbon capture optimization. Document the design decisions made and their rationale in the technical documentation, emphasizing the importance of collaboration with the cross-functional team. Update the project roadmap to reflect the completion of this task, once implemented. Upon completion, perform a code review before merging into the main branch.

title: Develop AI Model
description: Implement and train the AI model for optimizing carbon capture and storage processes.

title: Build Data Pipeline
description: Develop the data pipeline for ingesting and preprocessing data required by the AI model.

title: Implement User Interface
description: Design and develop the user interface for interacting with the CarbonCaptureOptimizer system.

title: Set up CI/CD Pipeline
description: Establish a continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipeline for the CarbonCaptureOptimizer system.

title: Conduct Security Audit
description: Perform a comprehensive security audit of the CarbonCaptureOptimizer system to identify and mitigate potential vulnerabilities.

title: Test and Validate System
description: Develop and execute a comprehensive testing plan to validate the functionality, performance, and reliability of the CarbonCaptureOptimizer system.

title: Deploy and Monitor System
description: Deploy the CarbonCaptureOptimizer system to production and establish monitoring and maintenance processes.

title: Create Documentation
description: Develop comprehensive documentation for the CarbonCaptureOptimizer system, including user guides, technical documentation, and maintenance procedures.
